erjang
Class ETask<H extends EHandle>

java.lang.Object
  kilim.Task
      erjang.ETask<H>
Direct Known Subclasses:
EDriverTask, EProc
public abstract class ETask<H extends EHandle>
extends kilim.Task

An ETask is what is common for processes and open ports
